Title: Fix macOS typed const real assignment
Description: Cast legacy real64_t to double when filling TypedConstValue to avoid long double variant assignment failures on macOS.
Acceptance: Modern semantic annotations build without long double assignment errors and local Release build plus tests pass.
Test_Method: cmake -S . -B build-codex -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DMATIEC_BUILD_TESTS=ON | cmake --build build-codex | ctest --test-dir build-codex --output-on-failure
Notes: macOS CI not rerun; Windows choco 504 in run 21323048078
